column3: Latest;Kandal:------ Sources said that a prisoner has escaped from the Kandal Province Penitentiary .------The incident happened at around 3 pm on August 28
column4: 2019 at Kandal Provincial Prison.------According to the source
column5: the man who escaped from the prison
column8: was jailed for stealing a mobile phone in Kandal province. He managed to jump over the wall and run off.------Police forces are now on high alert
